overview:
During the last 20 years Noel has mainly been involved in leading worship and, together with his wife Tricia and others, has written many worship songs. Perhaps the best known of these is “All Heaven Declares.”

For many years, Noel has had a strong focus on worship gatherings in stadiums. In January 2000 he played before 66,000 people at the Millennium Stadium, Wales, an event which was broadcast live to at least 5 million people in the UK.

He was also one of the organisers behind “Champion of the World” at Wembley Stadium in June 1997. This event attracted almost 45,000 people. In July 2006 he led an international worship and prayer gathering at the Olympic Stadium, Berlin, Germany that gathered 25,000 participants and attendees from more than 25 nations.

Noel is now a founding director of Worship Journal, a resource for all Christians, containing music, video, art, photography, poetry, teachings and much more to inspire you in your worship and help you grow in your relationship with God.
